attributes.action: To allow the Fund for Madeleine McCann - to be Tax Exempt
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I petition for Tax Exemption in relation to "Findmadeleine" Appeal Fund.

I was disturbed to read that despite the generosity of those whose wish to contribute to this fund in finding Madeleine McCann.

The Government will receive tax on those funds, as I consequence and given the importance that should be attached I petition that a Tax Exemption should be made for this Fund.
